author: Tyson L.
description: Rarely will you find MeeT empty  an arbitrary indicator of popularity if you care about that  as the vegan food is of high quality with solid portions After multiple visits some with Vegans others with the oh but you need animal protein to survive cohort 90% of guests would recommend the restaurant for its all-inclusive varying menu My test for a good restaurant is whether I could replicate the dishes and/or be willing to create the dishes and I could not with the same flavors Personally a big fan of the Macro bowl or the Meet burger but most friends are content with the selection of poutines and the Mighty Mac Good quality food is good quality food and whether youre vegan or not you will be satisfied

author: Melissa E.
description: Im not a vegan but I love trying innovative vegan food This place has a great drink menu and a great vibe Ordered the fried oyster mushroom calamari to start and it was super tasty Perfectly fried served with a nice garlicky tzatziki and a wedge of lemon Honestly I actually prefer this over real calamari My only complaint was it was a tad salty For the mains we had The Crispy BBQ burger and the Meet Burger This comes with salad and fries and both are delicious Salad was lightly dressed and had a nice tangy dressing Fries were soooo good like too good like you eat too many you have to unbutton the top of your pants after so you can breathe good The burgers were tasty but very big and hard to eat Bbq sauce was delicious Definitely coming back to try the bowls next Service was great as well

author: Matt B.
description: Im much more sold on this place nowadays I order every few months and am always satisfied One of my favourites is the Seoul bowl 17.50 plus tax which comes with deliciously seasoned and sauced chicken perfectly fermented kimchi sauteed mushrooms and onions cooked kale cooked bean sprouts raw carrots some nori served over brown rice and drizzled with a nice sweet ginger soy sauce Generous portion and nicely constructed bowl Very satisfying dish One of the better non-ethnic vegan places in town Recommended

author: Jill N.
description: Went here for St Patties Day Our server Derek was AWESOME Seriously made our night I got the double double and my friend got the angry bird with poutine It was my friends first time having vegan food and explained wow I thought Id have to compromise flavour but this is some of the best food Ive ever had a restaurant ever For dessert we had chocolate moose  so light and fluffy  and the cheesecake which was also very tasty and a bit richer Was an amazing evening Will definitely be back Huge shout out to Derek again for all his guidance patience and for being an awesome person as well Definitely put our already great evening off the charts

author: Maling S.
description: Sept 17 and went with my brother for vegan food Decided ok MeeT on Main We went about 5:30pm and was able to get a seat outside I now need to watch my sugar intake closely Its harder to eat out because of this They were able to find something I can have and adjusted some ingredients I had the Macro bowl Instead of mushrooms which I am not a fan of with sweet potato It was delicious I can confirm the dinner did not spike my blood sugar the next morning My brother had the Main burger and he enjoyed it He said its the best veggie burger he has had They were bumping busy with lots of people picking up orders Highly recommend

author: Dana S.
description: Ive ordered takeout from the Yaletown location but this was my first time dining in at a MeeT and I was pretty impressed The menu has great variety  no matter what type of cuisine you might be craving theres something for you Apparently theyre most known for their burgers but I really enjoyed the bowl I had here and from their Yaletown location I had the Butter Chikkin and absolutely loved the chicken the texture was very satisfying and it delivered the savoury flavour of chicken without being too meaty The curry sauce was also complex in taste and just spicy enough They serve it with a side salsa salad which I thought was kind of a surprising pairing with the butter chicken but it was really good regardless Everyone in my party really enjoyed their food and portion sizes were good all around This is the first restaurant Ive visited that does temperature checks for customers and from how simple it was Im surprised more places arent doing it The staff were all very friendly and despite being busy they were efficient and just attentive enough

author: Michelle H.
description: I havent had this is YEARS I used to be SO obsessed with Meet on Main back in high school During lunch breaks spare blocks and even before basketball practices/games I would always be rushing to Main Street to pick up my Noodley-Thai order Now that Im a little older and my preferences have changed a little i cant wait to finally try something else on their menu as Ive only ever ordered Noodley-Thai I also absolutely love their Chocolate and Coconut Ganache Tart vegan dairy-free it just melts in your mouth This is definitely up their in my top 5 favourite desserts  A little bit on the pricier side but its always a great experience whether Im dining in or getting take out My only complaint is that the food does take quite a bit of time

author: Jasmine Y.
description: Ordered takeout online to the Main Street location I arrived a little early and my order was done right when I got there which was awesome Love ordering online and picking up Makes it so convenient I ordered the ginger beef bowl and it was awesome Ive ordered a few times and everything Ive gotten has been amazing My sister is vegetarian and this is the 1 place she asks for Definitely one of the regular go tos

author: Aaron W.
description: Saw 3 patio tables empty and barely any line ups but was told to wait 45 mins Thought gave this a try again but the service isnt there Was also promised a gift card from the owner but its been over 3 years and never got that gift card Not gonna support this restaurant again

author: Jennifer B.
description: Love the MeeT restaurants in Vancouver Ive eaten here several times over the past few years Street parking is easy at this location Its usually busy but the wait if any is minimal We went on a Wednesday night for dinner It was packed but we got right in The entire menu is vegan and delicious We ordered two things wed never had before hot and sour soup and a special poutine The soup was very bland and brothy I wouldnt liken it to hot and sour soup at all The poutine was excellent and is featured just this week They have several types of poutine offered on the regular menu though The burger is fantastic if you want comfort food Comes with fries and a little salad The mushroom calamari is a must Lightly battered and delicious

author: Purple Z.
description: Ive been a couple times to the restaurant in Gastown always liked it Not disappointed at the Main location

author: Niall O.
description: The staff all seemed really nice and their was a nice atmosphere but the food was pretty poor It could just be that my partner and I both ordered the wrong item or were there on an off night but we felt like they were trading much more if the novelty of the vegan food resembling other dishes than it actually being particularly tasty

author: Chloe C.
description: I probably wont be dining out as often since school has started but I went to MeeT today for their weekly feature and it was hella good Chikkin Whoa-Fredo 5/5 I absolutely adored this dish While I would have liked a little more sauce since the sauce was delicious I have zero complaints about this The noodle to chikkin ratio was pretty good the Alfredo was creamy and flavourful the chikkin was tender and the arugla was fresh Alfredo is usually a hit or miss for me but MeeT nails it every time Crispy Kalamari Caesar 4.5/5 This was really good but for the first time in my life I am saying that there was too much dressing While I appreciate the generosity Ill probably ask for the dressing on the side next time The mushrooms were nice and crispy and the tzatziki was creamy and flavourful The greens were fresh and the croutons were crispy I really enjoyed this Theres a reason why MeeT is one of my go-to restaurants Their food is amazing and their weekly specials are always something to look forward to I will definitely be back hopefully soon

author: John R.
description: I used love MeeT on Main I order MeeT via door dash every Saturday I am noticing the quality of the food is going downhill from the Main Street location My friend and I ordered the Crispy BBQ Burger Hands down this is a very delicious burger mouth watering and you cant tell it is vegan The burger this time came so spicy that it caused heart burn and I had to stop eating it My friend also commented and asked me why so spicy The box the burger came in had bbq crispy burger written on it The previous burgers I have had were never this spicy Oyster mushroom Kalamari is great appie to order We highly recommend this dish This passed weekend I ordered MeeT on Main and the burger bun was stale and the flavour was not like I have had before

author: Norman S.
description: Never thought vegetarian food could taste this good Im a meat lover like all things meat Im there I was skeptical when we decided to go here but kept an open mind When I think of vegetarian or healthy foods I dont normally associate it with something flavourful or something I would opt for We ordered the Seoul Bowl and the Butter Chikkin Poutine Butter Chikken Poutine was hella good Like WOW didnt realize there could be something so flavourful and so tasty and it doesnt even contain meat This was absolutely tasty any way you look at it Seoul Bowl was jam packed with ingredients and had a variety of textures from kimchi to bean sprouts to carrots and mushrooms Seriously enjoyed every bite of it There was a slight confusion as I wasnt aware I would be ordering food from the bartender but once we figured that out everything was smooth The staff there was amazing and the bartender was super nice and made some killer drinks Ordered a That dont Empress me much and a Meet Ceasar The Empress drink had a nice frothy layer on top and the orange and grapefruit flavours made it extra tasty Ceasar was Ok to me but I feel that way about most Ceasars as its a pretty standard drink Also if youre a fan on Kombucha they have it on tap and the entire dining experience I watch them pump out dozens of drinks out Must be sometime to check out next time I think you deserve to experience this place You maybe skeptical like me but go in there with an open mind I think youd be really surprised

author: Elsa C.
description: It was a rainy Friday in January A group of 8 of us arrived at 11:30 and were seated immediately There was a list of kombucha but only 2 were available at that time I ordered the house Kombucha and it tasted alright We ordered at 11:52am and the order arrived at 12:07pm I ordered the Thai salad I forgot to ask for the dressing to be on the side and I find the salad to be a bit overdressed for my liking The salad was ok Nothing special Some of the group didnt really like it some find it good Overall nice experience

author: Chef D.
description: This spot always serves up the yummiest vegan food My personal favourite is the Vegan Mac and Cheese If you ever need somewhere for some delicious vegan comfort food

author: Patrick F.
description: A great selection of Vegan food The sweet chili Cauliflower was delicious The burger was great Looking forward to visiting again

author: Autumn M.
description: Its taken me way too long to review this place Ive eaten in-house twice over the past year and ordered takeout from here countless times I usually get the macaroni and cheese with the added sausage and damn its so good That said Ive ordered quite a few things off their menu and Ive been impressed with everything They dont skimp out on flavour When we ate in the service was great too The waitress was friendly and not intrusive When its safe to do so well definitely be back In the meantime well happily keep ordering takeout

author: A. W.
description: Why is the service here so poor The food is okay  but every time I come here alone or with someone else the servers will seat me and then its at least 10-15 minutes before anyone will ask if I need a beverage or am ready to order Feels like an eon  and its like this regardless of how busy they are Ooof
